# AI Prompting לפיננסים - AI Courses for Finance Professionals

## About
Professional AI prompting course designed for accountants and finance professionals in Israel.
Instructor: Ronen Amos (CPA, AI Expert, 10+ years experience)
Contact: ronenamos@gmail.com

## Main Page

https://ronenamos-arch.github.io/AmosAICourses/

## Course Content

9 professional modules covering:
- Module 1: Introduction to Generative AI in Finance
- Module 2: Financial Terminology for Effective AI Communication
- Module 3: Automating Financial Reporting
- Module 4: Financial Analysis and Forecasting
- Module 5: Generating Business Insights
- Module 6: Customer Communication
- Module 7: Financial Education and Training
- Module 8: Security and Privacy in AI Usage
- Module 9: Ethics and Responsibility in AI
